_comment: The command-line compiler functions of VS 2008 C++.
To work out fwlink URLs for this manifest, extract baseline.dat from vcs_web.exe (using 7zip).
Version is the version reported by cl.exe
description: The command-line compiler functions of VS 2008 C++.

env_set.INCLUDE: $dir\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\ATLMFC\INCLUDE;$dir\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\INCLUDE;$dir\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\include
env_set.LIB: $dir\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\ATLMFC\LIB;$dir\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\LIB;$dir\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\lib;
